thread.title: Looncup - the period gadget that texts women from inside their bodies
thread.title_full: Looncup - the period gadget that texts women from inside their bodies

author: Radhika Sanghani
title: Looncup - the period gadget that texts women from inside their bodies
text: Women's Life Looncup - the period gadget that texts women from inside their bodies Menstruation is finally getting the wearable tech make-over it deserves with Looncup - a device that monitors a woman's period flow and sends updates to users' phones Looncup: The menstrual cup with a difference Photo: Looncup
